title: Link Maintenance Message

participantDestinationIdentification.description: Provides details about the destination participant and account identification

managementGroup.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalFeeManagementGroupCode.

positionConsolidation.$comment: Optional field. When true, positions will be consolidated across the linked accounts.
